abstract: A new permanent exhibition chronicling the elusive history of Prague's Jewish community, from the end of World War II until now, recently opened in an appropriate venue: the city's ornate Jubilee synagogue.
snippet: A new permanent exhibition chronicling the elusive history of Prague's Jewish community, from the end of World War II until now, recently opened in an appropriate venue: the city's ornate Jubilee synagogue.
lead_paragraph: A new permanent exhibition chronicling the elusive history of Prague's Jewish community, from the end of World War II until now, recently opened in an appropriate venue: the city's ornate Jubilee Synagogue (Jeruzalemska 7).

headline.main: Prague Synagogue Hosts Show on the City's Jewish Community
